pkgmetadata.longdescription: Obtain and Visualize Regulome-Gene Expression Correlations in Cancer // Builds a 'SQLite' database file of pre-calculated transcription factor/microRNA-gene correlations (co-expression) in cancer from the Cistrome Cancer Liu et al. (2011) doi:10.1186/gb-2011-12-8-r83 and 'miRCancerdb' databases (in press). Provides custom classes and functions to query, tidy and plot the correlation data.
